on reading compounds: 塵【ジン】defilement, impurity, affliction, object (perceived with the mind or the senses), one billionth
塵埃【ジンアイ】dust, dirt, dreary world, petty affairs of everyday life
灰塵【カイジン】ashes and dust
kun reading compounds: ちり紙【ちりがみ】tissue paper, toilet paper
ゴミ箱【ゴミばこ】garbage can, rubbish bin, trash can, dustbin
粗大ごみ【そだいごみ】large-size refuse (e.g. furniture, electrical goods), oversized garbage, bulky rubbish, useless man about the house, husband that is retired and considered a nuisance
家庭ごみ【かていごみ】household garbage, household trash, household refuse
